original: @228b # // na mo buddh'a ya /
analyzed: @228b # // na mo buddh'a ya /
translated: Namo buddh캐ya.

original: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med //
analyzed: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med //
translated: [It is] unborn and unceasing,

original: gzugs med gzugs dang ldan pa'ang med //
analyzed: gzugs med gzugs dang ldan pa'ang med //
translated: Not formless and not possessing form,

original: 'khor med mya ngan 'das pa'ang med //
analyzed: 'khor med mya ngan 'das pa'ang med //
translated: Not cyclic existence and not transcendence of suffering,

original: na yi yi ges brjod pa'o //
analyzed: na yi yi ges brjod pa'o //
translated: [And] is expressed by the syllable na.

original: mo / gti mug rtag tu 'jig par byed //
analyzed: mo / gti mug rtag tu 'jig par byed //
translated: Mo [means] always destroying delusion,

original: thar pa gcig bu legs par ster //
analyzed: thar pa gcig bu legs par ster //

original: bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms par byed //
analyzed: bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms par byed //

original: yi ge ma yis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge ma yis brjod pa'o //
translated: [And] is expressed by the syllable ma.

original: bud / sangs rgyas kyis ni pha rol gshegs //
analyzed: bud / sangs rgyas kyis ni pha rol gshegs //
translated: Bud [means] the Buddha has gone beyond,

original: sangs rgyas 'gro ba phan pa med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'gro ba phan pa med //
translated: The Buddha has no benefit for beings,

original: sangs rgyas nyon mongs dag pa ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyon mongs dag pa ni //
translated: The Buddha is pure of afflictions,

original: yi ge bud kyis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge bud kyis brjod pa'o //
translated: [And] is expressed by the syllable bud.

original: dh'a / chos rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yis//
analyzed: dh'a / chos rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yis//
translated: Dh캐 [means] by holding all phenomena,

original: chos kyi dbyings dang bcas par ni //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings dang bcas par ni //
translated: Along with the dharmadh캐tu,游댷Phenomena themselves are the supreme phenomena,

original: chos rnams nyid ni chos kyi mchog / yi ge dh'a yis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams nyid ni chos kyi mchog / yi ge dh'a yis brjod pa'o //
translated: [And] is expressed by the syllable dh캐.游댷Ya [means] just as it abides, so it is destroyed;

original: ya / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin 'jig / ji ltar 'jig pa de bzhin gnas //
analyzed: ya / ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin 'jig / ji ltar 'jig pa de bzhin gnas //

original: ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed //
analyzed: ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed //

original: yi ge ya yis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge ya yis brjod pa'o //

translated: The commentary on Namo Buddhaya is finished.
